entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

LOWS IN THE MID 50S
